checkHostKey.description: Perform a strict validation of the host SSH keys (and return exception if key is not recognized as valid)

dataTransferConnection.description: Sometimes HPC clusters provide dedicated hostnames for large data transfers, which guarantee a higher efficiency for data movements

file.description: Path to a file containing a Jinja2 template, describing how the StreamFlow command should be executed in the remote environment

maxConcurrentJobs.description: Maximum number of jobs concurrently scheduled for execution on the Queue Manager

maxConcurrentSessions.description: Maximum number of concurrent session to open for a single SSH client connection

passwordFile.description: Path to a file containing the password to use for authentication

pollingInterval.description: Time interval (in seconds) between consecutive termination checks

sshKey.description: Path to the SSH key needed to connect with Slurm environment

sshKeyPassphraseFile.description: Path to a file containing the passphrase protecting the SSH key

transferBufferSize.description: Buffer size allocated for local and remote data transfers

tunnel.description: External SSH connection parameters for tunneling

username.description: Username needed to connect with the SSH environment
